attributes.action: award knighthoods to two national heroes namely Henry allingham and Harry patch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for too long now these two first world war veterans have been ignored. it is about time this nation recognised the debt we all owe too them both. while we are at it we expect these two to have a state funeral when they pass, lets hope they stay with us for a long time to come though.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
